body.name: Desert Essence Daily Essential Facial Moisturizer - 4 Fl Ounce - Jojoba Oil - Aloe Vera - Prevents Acne - Soft Radiant Skin - Geranium Essential Oil for Natural Fragrance - For Normal Skin
body.stockDetail: Only 12 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 26 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: EFFECTIVE MOISTURIZATION - This face moisturizer formula contains natural aloe vera and jojoba oil that naturally moisturizes your skin and infuses it with great hydration for a healthy look.
SKIN NOURISHMENT - This daily essential moisturizing solution nourishes your skin at day or night. Boost skin hydration levels and restores a healthy and radiant glow.
NATURAL FRAGRANCE - This skin care product has a naturally pleasant and uplifting aroma that comes from the sweet-smelling essential oil of geranium.

NO OILY RESIDUE - This face moisturizer has a non-oily texture that gets quickly absorbed in the skin without leaving any kind of greasy residue. Ideal choice for application alone or underneath make-up.
REGULAR USE & EFFECTIVE RESULTS - When used on a regular basis, this skin moisturizing cream helps to provide hydrated skin with a radiant youthful glow.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Revitalize Your Hands, Feet and Body Desert Essence foot, hand and body lotions are available in a range of delicious scents and irresistibly silky formulas that leave your skin feeling smooth to the touch. Infused with essential oils, vitamins and fruits, this line of organic hand and body lotion is a must-have in your daily skin care routine. Find ultimate comfort in a natural moisturizer that is healthy for your unique skin.

Natural Beauty Redefined Focused on improving health and happiness for the global population, Desert Essence has been sourcing nature's best ingredients to craft pure and effective personal care products since 1978. Desert Essence is a company dedicated to nature and committed to creating only the most responsible products, from shampoo to toothpaste and everything in between. You will experience beauty naturally, from the ground up.

Desert Essence Daily Essential Moisturizer - 4 Fl oz Light and soothing moisturizer, naturally scented with sweet smelling essential oil of Geranium Jojoba Oil and Aloe Vera rehydrate and restore skin's softness Non-oily texture of this cream makes it ideal for application alone or underneath makeup Day or night, keep skin looking radiant and hydrated NO parabens, artificial ingredients/dyes, animal testing, SLS, PEGS, PPG, MEA, DEA or TEA Vegan and Fragrance/Gluten-Free

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective and economical
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this for years. The online store I used to buy it from closed in March so I was happy to find it here for a decent price. It’s moisturizing and not expensive. The scent is mild and pleasant.Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and Makes your skin feel smooth
reviews.reviewText: I would highly recommend this moisturizer. I generally use it at night or after a shower (or whenever I don't use my SPF moisturizer). It is lightweight yet still hydrating. Does not make your skin feel oily. I've had mine for over a year now, it lasts a long time. There is no scent. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t let the bad reviews scare you.
reviews.reviewText: I am Italian. I say that to let the reader know that I have oily skin. Really oily skin. Every time I find a face moisturizer it breaks me out like crazy and clogs my extra oily pores even more than they are. I use all desert essence products and I LOVE them soI figured I’d give this one a try too. The first time I used it my face did have a reaction to the Lye. Don’t worry- it went away within fifteen minutes and after a few weeks of using it my skin adjusted and now it’s clearer than ever. I FINALLY found a face cream that moisturizes my face without making it oily. This works as a great primer too. Love that this is a vegan product not tested on animals - the whole line of skin care is wonderful especially for those like me who have extremely oily skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this item because I had good luck with other products from same company.This face cream has is light weight, applies easily and, most importantly, is unscented.I've tried lots of face creams. This one felt a bit lightweight at first, but I have gotten used to it. Dissolves on skin quickly. I recommend that you give it a go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my sensitive, combination skin!
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff! I won't rehash all the details, but in addition to the info listed on the packaging/in the description, I like that it doesn't contain silicone. It's not that silicone is bad for my skin, but it doesn't do much in a moisturizer besides add slip for cheaper than using more oils and fatty acids, which provide their own slip. It says it's scented with natural geranium essential oil, but don't worry if you can't stand the smell of geraniums. It's a quite mild, faint, almost brown sugar smell. It's not the odor of the stalks and leaves. It is so faint that if they didn't tell me it was scented on purpose, I would just think it was unscented. It's a decent size jar for the price, much cheaper than other face creams I've used. I used to use the Welleda baby face lotion with calendula, but it's so greasy compared to this. The Desert Essence is light and sinks right into the skin, without leaving a sticky residue or coating of oil. I use it at night and in the morning, after I wash my face. I will continue to use this until they stop making it or change the formula drastically.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars ... first found this product I thought it was a great deal for the price
reviews.reviewText: When I first found this product I thought it was a great deal for the price... but I soon found out that I got what I paid for with this one. At first, my complaints weren't that major: it would get in my eyebrows and make them feel gross and it also wouldn't fully moisturizer my t-zone no matter how many layers I would do (I have combo skin where I am oily in my t-zone and normal everywhere else and I am also acne/blackhead prone).Then the real horror happened. I use chemical exfoliants (both BHA and AHA) and have been for years without any issue. I had even been using them with this moisturizer for nearly 3 weeks with no issue. But one day the moisturizer reacted horribly with my exfoliants and gave me what felt and looked like a horrible sun burn. It stung for about 2 minutes and my face looked horribly red all over!I thought I might of been my exfoliants because the moisturizer doesn't react like that when I don't use them but I tried them with a new moisturizer and there was no problem at all.So this could work for you if maybe you have dry or normal skin and don't use chemical exfoliants. Even then, I would say it's a gamble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Desert Essence Moisturizer for the past three years and does not disappoint. I apply it before putting on makeup and after cleansing my skin. I am a satisfied customer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t work for me
reviews.reviewText: This didn’t work for me. I loved that it made my skin feel soft but I developed little bumps on my face that weren’t visible and didn’t hurt but we’re spreading along my face. I do have sensitive skin though and this just didn’t agree with it. I did like the texture and that it easily absorbed into my face leaving it soft and smooth with no residue at all. My only negative comment is that it doesn’t smell so nice in my opinion. I know it’s a safe product so I’m bummed it did not work for me. All skin is different and it’s worth a try to find a safe product that the EWG rates as safe. Just didn’t work for me so I’ll have to go back to my Cetaphil for now.

Use after shaving in a dry prairie environment.I like this because I don't notice that it's on my face. It has no scent and doesn't feel clammy after a few minutes.Helps keep my face from getting too oily or too dry, with no extra pointless additives.
The moisturizer is very soothing without being greasy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 26, 2013
reviews.reviewText: It's perfume free which i really like, with a very nice and soft texture and the reason I bought it in the first place is that it's listed on EWG.com like one of the most toxic-free facial creams. Win-win!
Not sticky. Absorbs right into skin. Excellent for sensitive skin. Love it.
